transcript:
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Ji Ajay ji, Taruna baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Hmm hmm ji.
Executive: Sir ye Gatimaan Agro Forestry Private Limited ke naam se ticket raise hua tha mere paas. Aapki services ke regarding aapki baat hui thi aapke account manager Smita se but aapne not satisfied mark kiya tha sir services mein. Kya issues aa rahe the sir?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir kya reason tha? Ji bataiye.
Customer: Jaise leads sahi nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha leads sahi nahi aa rahi hai. Leads sahi kis usse nahi aa rahi hai? Matlab aapke product se related nahi aa rahi hai ya?
Customer: Nahi nahi product se ek paudha do paudha ke liye aa rahi hai. Bulk nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Matlab bulk inquiry nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir aapko ye IndiaMART mein aap jab open karte ho na sir jab apne phone mein ya apne seller panel jab open karte hain to waha pe filter option aata hai ek?
Executive: Filter option mein na sir do teen options hain aapke jaise product se related aapko lead aa rahi hai to waha pe bulk bulk inquiry ka option bhi aata hai ek. Bulk ya order value aap apne 50000 se upar ki dalo. Thik hai usko select karke na tab aap usko search karo aapko recent lead mein wo sari aane lag jayengi lead jo thodi high value ki hongi bulk order ki hongi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai usse aapka ye kya rahega sir jaise bulk dekho hamesha sir Ajay ji main aapko thoda sa sir ek matlab jo aap expect karke baithe hain ki sari lead agar matlab main aapko weekly 17 lead aa rahi hai 17 aap consume kar rahe ho is category mein to 17 ke 17 sari bulk hi nahi aa sakti sir Ajay ji. Ye to sir dekhiye aap bhi jante hain ki 100% aisa customer bhi hum nahi de sakte na jo matlab aap bhi samjho ki 17 ke 17 matlab 50000 1 lakh se upar ke order ke ho aur sab aapko mil jaye. Aisa possible nahi hota leads hain sir har tarah ki aayengi aap filter option hamara use kijiye waha se aap apne filter karke apni bulk order mein apna filter lagaiye ki 50000 se upar ke value ki mujhe order wali leads chahiye. To waha pe aap filter laga ke jab recent search karenge to aapko leads aa jayengi aap usme se aap lead consume kar sakte hain. But otherwise bahut sari leads sir aisi bhi hoti hain jab aap ek single wali jab by lead consume karte ho na jab baat karte ho unse to ye platform kya hai na sir ye B to B portal hai. Yaha pe mostly wahi customer sir 90% 80% aayenge jo bulk mein order lete hain. Dekho ab jo aapke paas customer aa raha hoga wo wholesaler retailer trader manufacturer aise hi hoga na. Agar man lo aap manufacturer ho to aapke paas aise hi lead aa rahi hongi na jo matlab trader ya retailer ho jinko bulk mein inquiring ho ya retailer ho jisko apni dukan ke liye bulk mein order chahiye ho ab wo ek lead ke liye to inquiry karega nahi aap se ek lead ke liye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Samajh gaye sir to har tarah ka customer hoga aap usko baat karne ke baad thoda pata chalta hai sir jab aap baat karoge to bahut sari cheeze pata chalti hain ki achcha samne wale ko ye requirement hai ho sakta hai wo inquiry kar raha ho ek piece ki lekin wo aap se rate pata kar raha ho usko chahiye ho 500 piece 1000 piece ya 50 piece ya 100 piece right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To wo aapko sir baat karne ke baad hi pata chalega na ki samne wale ka requirement kya hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right to by leads consume kijiye sir filter option aapko bataya nahi tha aapko ki kaise kaise consume karna hai.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hmm filter ka bataya tha aapko ki bulk order kahan se lead kaise dekhte hain bataya tha aapko Smita ne?
Customer: Bataye to the. Ji bataye the.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Bataye to the lekin humne call laga ke dekha bhi hai to yahi pata chala ki nahi aisa hai ki humko ek paudha chahiye do paudha chahiye aise.
Executive: Agar agar thoda waisa dikkat ho raha ho samajhne mein ya matlab kuch dikkat aa rahi ho to aap ek kaam karo na aap video meet pe aa jao main dekh leti hu waha se aapko matlab bata dungi ki kaise kahan se karna hai dikha dete hain. Agar aapke pass time hai to uske liye kar lijiye. Agar matlab phone pe aapko samajh nahi aa rahi hai cheeze ki phone pe main aise aise dikhani hai sari cheeze to aap waha se bhi kar sakte hain.
Executive: Otherwise otherwise sir dekho wo jo maine aapko filter option bataya waha se karke dekho waha se aayegi aayegi aur jo lead aa rahi hai na lead pe sir baat karke dekhiye. Bina baat kare jitni leads aa rahi hain kai bar aise hota hai ki inquiry to ek do pieces ke liye karta hai lekin order bulk mein hi chahiye. Kyunki rate pata karne ke liye bhi customer kai bar kar deta hai na aise sir ki ek piece ka kitna kya hoga charges kya honge samajh rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Chaliye aur iske alawa iske alawa koi aur issue hai sir matlab aur kuch khali yahi hai ki matlab sirf yahi issue hai ki bulk mein nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan yahi hai.
Executive: Aapka consumption wagera sir achcha hai achche se consume kariye Ajay ji aayegi bulk lead baki main ek kaam karti hu main aapko na ek group bhi create karati hu main Smrita se na aapko kuch lead aapko whatsapp pe bhijwati hu. Thik hai?
Customer: Haan haan sahi hai.
Executive: Waha se aap consume karke ek bar dekho ek do lead ki kaisa kya aa raha hai aur lead ka feedback mujhe dena.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Thik hai? Matlab lead consume karke dekh ke mujhe feedback dena ki thik hai ye lead sahi hai aapke matlab ki hai ki nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sahi rahega?
Customer: Chaliye thik hai.
Executive: Aisa karke dekh lete hain ek bar baki aapki sir ek ticket open hui thi usko main close kar deti hu Ajay ji aapke paas feedback ke liye aayega sir please usko yes kar dijiyega wo hamare liye hota hai feedback right?
Customer: Achcha. Yes kar dena usko thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur sir isme aur kuch agar janna ho aapko services related kuch concern ho aur to bataiye.
Customer: Ab suniye hum phone karenge aapko.
Executive: Thik hai sir main aapko bhejti hu sir baki aapko sir ticket close karti hu uske liye please feedback bhej dijiyega thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai ji. Thank you sir.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving bulk order leads.

Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filter option.

- Executive offered a video meet to demonstrate.

- Executive will share leads on WhatsApp.

Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on WhatsApp leads.

- Customer to provide feedback on closed ticket.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filter, whatsapp, b2b portal
